text: Middle of the ocean. Water calm, not a boat in sight. Exc a junky old MOTOR YACHT.

The man on the bridge, piloting the yacht, is GABRIEL BLA 35, athletic, handsome, sharp eyes and a capable demeanor cuts the engines and a plume of black diesel smoke envelo him for a moment and then disappears in the wind. He climbs down the ladder and walks easily along the narr gunnel on the side of the boat, to the broad bow deck. He stands in the center, the boat bobbing gently on the soft waves, and STARES UP AT THE STARS, LOOKING FOR SOMETHING. After a moment, his HEAD TILTS QUICKLY AND SHARPLY, as if struck by something. Then he stares straight ahead, almos trance-like, and WE SMASHCUT TO:

CAMERA GLIDES through a moment FROZEN IN TIME - a THREE DIMENSIONAL SNAPSHOT of the 2008 Mumbai attacks. BODIES a strewn across the floor, MASKED GUNMEN POINT AUTOMATIC WEAPONS, a WOMAN squats in a corner, holding her ears in scream, a window has just shattered, GLASS FROZEN IN AIR. [This “CYBER-RENDERING” will be explained, but to see a visual example of what we’re imagining please CLICK HERE. CAMERA continues to glide past these STILL IMAGES, until. quick glance at a MIRROR and WE SEE MOVEMENT. It's Gabrie the only figure moving through the eerie and surreal scen He's searching for something - someone. As he walks, something else begins to happen. The walls deconstruct an their place we see a DATA STREAM - PHOTOS, NEWSPAPER HEADLINES, TV TALKING HEADS, SURVEILLANCE PHOTOS - all related to the Mumbai attacks. CLOSE ON GABRIEL’S MOUTH as he whispers...
Amelia, where are you? PULL BACK from his lips and WE’RE...  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 2

Gabriel standing on the bow of the boat. GABRIEL'S POV - the 3D ENVIRONMENT of the TAJ MAHAL HOTEL LOBBY surrounds him, semi-translucent. He’s somehow creat a virtual space, out here in the middle of the ocean. Beyond the virtual images, Gabriel also spots an approach VESSEL on the horizon.
Not yet... I haven’t found her.
Gabriel continues to move through the macabre scene and s the woman he's looking for..

No... Amelia, no. He approaches the frozen figure of AMELIA HAYTES, a strik beautiful, Caucasian woman, 30, blue backpack slung over shoulder, an AUTOMATIC RIFLE in her hands, angrily pointi it at a group of HOSTAGES. Standing next to her is anothe GUNMAN, the FLAME from his gun barrel suspended in mid-bu As Gabriel approaches them, WE SEE a rapid DATA STREAM in Gabriel's POV - THE MAN'S NAME, COUNTRY OF ORIGIN - PAKIS AND HIS INTERNATIONAL RAP SHEET. Gabriel turns back to Am and a similar DATA STREAM flashes various images, a CIA I and her name.
How could you... WE HEAR a LOUD VOICE of someone speaking over a PA, IN HI
(subtitled) Attention, this is the Indian Coast Guard, prepare to be boarded! CLOSE ON Gabriel, as he TURNS toward the VOICE, the entir hotel lobby falling away, revealing that we’re back on...
A large INDIAN COAST GUARD VESSEL looms just thirty meter off the port bow. Gabriel, very calmly, holds his hands u surrender.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 3

location: INTERROGATION ROOM, INDIAN COAST GUARD CUTTER

text: Gabriel is being questioned by an Indian Intelligence Off named BADRI ADANI.
You are in Indian waters, on a rented boat, with no papers, no passport. Gabriel doesn’t respond.
What were you doing twenty miles off shore all by yourself? Gabriel glances up at the CAMERA pointed at him from abov Switch to CAMERA POV of Gabriel staring at us.
Outside the door, a similar CAMERA is aimed down the corridor. CAMERA POV: A FEMALE OFFICER approaches, carrying a CUP O COFFEE. She types in a series of numbers on the ELECTRIC LOCK.
Gabriel looks at the door as the final ELECTRONIC BEEP of door combination signals the CLICK of the door opening. T female officer enters and hands Adani his coffee.
(Hindi, subtitled) We’re pulling into port now. Adani smiles at her, which Gabriel notices, and she leave Adani takes a sip of his coffee and continues...

At eighteen hundred hours, we were alerted to a Level One sigint breach on a highly protected military geosync satellite. We sourced the signal to your vessel, yet we didn’t find any communication equipment on board, let alone with the processing power to break through a Helio-encrypted fire wall. Can you explain that?  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 4 10 11
You know, she doesn’t like the attention you give her.
What are you talking about?
That officer. Abhilasha. She's married and you make her uncomfortable.
How do you know her name?
In fact, she’s afraid of you. Why is that, Badri?
I haven't told you my first name. Gabriel looks at the SURVEILLANCE CAMERA again. CAMERA’S POV - LOOKING BACK AT GABRIEL. He’s looking back himself, through the camera. CUT TO:
CAMERA POV of the HALLWAY. Empty.

How do you know who I am? Who are you? Gabriel looks at the door and the LOCK STARTS DIALING. Ad follows Gabriel's gaze to the door as it CLICKS, but does open. He walks to the door and opens it, finding no one outside. He suddenly realizes something...

Did you just do that? He turns back to Gabriel, but the CHAIR IS EMPTY -- SLAM, Adani crashes against the wall and the last thing he sees Gabriel’s feet running up the corridor.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 5 12 13 14 15

Alarms blare as Gabriel runs down another corridor. He reaches a ladder and CLIMBS IT QUICKLY, just as AN INDIAN SAILOR come running toward him. He turns behind him and T MORE are coming from that direction. He runs toward the single sailor. The sailor STRIKES, but Gabriel parries th blow, his other fist snapping like gun hammer into the ma throat. The sailor staggers backward, gasping, as Gabriel heads toward a ladder.

The docks of the port pass by on either side as Gabriel emerges onto the deck and RUNS. SAILORS SHOUT behind him. appears in his path with an AUTOMATIC RIFLE. Gabriel drop behind a turret, a barrage of bullets flying past him and ricocheting off the steel of the vessel. The gun continues firing from over Gabriel’s shoulder, wh twenty sailors come at him from two other directions. Amo them is a bleeding and angry Adani, pistol in hand. Gabriel doesn’t hesitate, running in the only direction available to him - the edge of the deck and the water bel Bullets swarm as he dives and splashes into the water of harbour. Adani and the other officers run to the edge of boat and look down into the murky darkness and see NOTHIN
A cow lazily lumbers along the side of the road, chewing tall grass, as a black SUV zooms by.

The black SUV leaves a dust trail behind it as it snakes higher and higher up the hillside. It finally barrels up the rise, giving us a VIEW of... A HEAVILY FORTIFIED COMPLEX in the middle of Virginia far country. The compound is comprised of a dozen buildings, large array of radar dishes spread out across a green pasture, all surrounded by MILITARY VEHICLES and SOLDIERS with DOGS circling the perimeter barbed-wire fence. ON SCREEN: U.S. CYBER COMMAND - ANGEL'S BLUFF, VIRGINIA.
INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 6

MIRRORS slide under the vehicle, while a MILITARY SERGEAN flips through paperwork. He takes two IDs from the DRIVER knocks on the back window. It opens, REVEALING RILEY O’NE He checks her face against the ID.

Riley O’Neil? Your driver knows where to take you. There is no wandering inside or outside the facility. No photography, audio recording, cell phone, or portable computing of any kind. You are not to ask any questions or speak to any employees, except for Ms. Strand. Any violations of these rules can result in your immediate arrest. Do you understand everything I’ve just said?

Yes, Sergeant. Before she can say anything else, he steps away and signa to someone to raise the gate. The gate in front of the SU swings up and the driver pulls slowly through. On each si of the gate are SOLDIERS, M-16s slung over their shoulder

The sounds of Riley’s footsteps and that of her driver ec down the empty hallway, approaching another guard desk. T double doors behind the desk open and a woman steps out. She's LILLIAN STRAND, 50. Lillian has strong, attractive features, piercing eyes, conservative suit, and an all- business demeanor.
Pleasure to finally meet you, Ms. Strand. I’ve heard a lot ab...
This way, please. The driver stays behind, as Riley follows Lillian back through the double doors and into:

It’s a sprawling collection of LAB STATIONS, populated by hundreds of MEN and WOMEN in WHITE COATS.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 7 They pass a section where a woman wearing an EXOSKELETON on a treadmill at 40mph, as TECHNICIANS monitor her.
I understand you have questions.
I was ordered to go through months of testing and vetting and nobody will even tell me what the job is.

That's because the position itself is Classified Code Word. Riley expects Lillian to tell her about the job, but Lill just keeps walking. They pass a lab station where a man w EEG sensors on his head sits quietly reading the newspape As he does, the WORDS of the article he’s reading APPEAR BY ONE ON THE MONITOR on the wall.
What’s he doing?
Word Mapping. Ever word has a corresponding brain signal. We’re translating them in real time.
Is that even possible?
What do you know about CyberCom?
I know you’re responsible for cyber security for the government.

CyberCom’s purview includes the development of genetics, robotics, artificial intelligence and nanotechnology, as well as data mining, DeepNet salvage, cryptanlysis, and protection of the Global Information Grid. And then there’s Clockwork.
Clockwork? Two ARMED SOLDIERS open a set of double doors for them.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 8
They walk down a long corridor toward another set of door

Last year, 60 Minutes first aired a story about a quadriplegic who could operate a robotic arm with her mind. The microchip attached to her brain was created right here. But Clockwork took it further than we could ever imagine. They reach the doors at the other end of the hallway. A s sign says, “CLOCKWORK.” Two more ARMED GUARDS open the do

They enter a walkway surrounding the glass walls of a rou room - THE LAB. A few TECHNICIANS work on equipment surrounding an examination table, on which lies a MAN, th top of his head facing us, so we can’t see him just yet.

Once we started translating the brain’s signals - phase syncrony, neural integration, proteomics - we realized we could facilitate a direct neural interface that could access the entire electromagnetic spectrum - telephone, internet, radio, satellite...
Are you saying you put a computer in a man’s brain?

I’m saying we created a man who is the first of his kind. An advanced intelligence agent. Now we see the man on the table. It’s Gabriel. His eyes a closed, as a TECHNICIAN works a computer next to him.
We built an agency complex around him - analysts, tack teams, field ops. When a situation rises to a certain level of national security, the Director of National Intelligence brings us in. (MORE )
INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813
Gabriel's been active for six months and since then, we’ve enjoyed an 85% success rate. Included in that success is the thwarting of the Super Bowl bomber.
I thought that was CIA?
You haven't been cleared to think anything different. Lillian opens the door and leads Riley into...
Lillian and Riley enter.
What are they doing to him? The technician, AMOS PEMBROKE (29), looks up. that he can answer.
Stuxnet Two eradication.
Stuxnet? The computer virus? He looks at Lillian. She nods again.

Virus? Please. Stuxnet is the world’s first weaponized cyber worm, a digital cruise missile. We took out Iran’s nuke program first, and now North Korea. Boo-yah. (beat) Of course, the only way to plant it in an isolated, bunkerized system, four stories underground, was for Gabriel to carry it himself... (points to Gabriel's head) Which is why we’re making sure none of the code burrowed in.
Is he under anaesthesia? Lillian nods  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 10
He wishes. (opens his eyes) Riley. You've changed your hair color.

I’m sorry, have we met? Now we see Riley from GABRIEL'S POV. A facial recognition program draws lines around her face, measuring distance between eyes, etc., as DATA STREAMS, including flashes of TEXT and PHOTOS - are on each side of the screen.
No, but wow.
What does that mean?
That nude photo you sent to your boyfriend in college. And they’re yours. Nice.
Excuse me? Riley looks at Lillian, who isn’t amused.
Gotta be careful when you send pictures out there. It’s called Digital Permanence, right Amos?
Don’t worry, he can’t print. By the way, I’m Amos Pembroke, Gabriel’s pri-tech.
Pri-tech?
Primary technician.
Nobody around here uses more syllables than they have to. You’1l fit right in.
Did you just call me stupid?  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 1
Ten-sixty on your SATs?
I was a bad test taker. Who the hell do you think you are?
Whoa, I just found a sealed juvenile record?
Gabriel, don’t open that file.

What’s in it? Shoplifting? (hands up in surrender) Fine. But tell me, how does the daughter of a surgeon and a chemist become a Secret Service Agent? In GABRIEL'S POV we FLASH to various images in rapid fire FAMILY PHOTOS, NEWSPAPER CLIPPINGS, FACEBOOK PAGES. Final a quick shot of President OBAMA getting into a limo, RILE CLOSING THE LIMO DOOR, an earpiece in her ear.
Youngest woman ever assigned to presidential detail. That’s the beginning of a storied career. And now what? Follow around a charming devil with a chip in his brain?
Impressive. Almost every word of that was accurate.
Almost? Which word did I get wrong?
Charming. Amos stifles a laugh. Gabriel shoots him a look. Lillian suddenly very satisfied with her choice in Riley.
(to Lillian) You should find someone else. Riley walks out. Lillian glares at Gabriel.
Nice try.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 12

Riley walks down the hall. Lillian steps out of the lab, calmly watching her. A moment later, Riley opens the door an ALARM SOUNDS and the ARMED GUARDS appear. Riley turns to Lillian, gestures to the guards to stand down. One of types a code into a wall keypad, the alarm stops. The doo close again, leaving Riley and Lillian in the empty hallw
We looked at the best agents from every discipline. Of the top twenty, you’re the only one we brought here.
I’m a secret service agent. What could you possibly want me for?
In that room is the most valuable piece of technology this country’s ever produced. What do I want you for? You're going to protect it for us. Off Riley’s look...
INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 13 23 24

EXT. DR. WILLIAM CRISPIN’S HOME, CHESAPEAKE BAY - NIGHT 2 A secluded home in the thick woods of the Chesapeake Bay. INT. KITCHEN, DR. WILLIAM CRISPIN’S HOME - NIGHT 24 Standing at the sink, hand washing the dishes, DR. WILLIA CRISPIN, 70, talks out loud. Nobody else is in the room. he insane?

Albert, when I was at NASA in ‘69, we sent an astronaut to the moon. A cell phone today has a million times more computer power than we put on that spacecraft. Technology isn’t revolutionary. It’s evolutionary. Oh, that’s good. I like that. Crispin opens the refrigerator, takes out a carton of mil and pours a glass for himself and then pours a bowl for t cat who just landed on the kitchen counter. Then, a SOUND

Sounds like our raccoons are back. Crispin walks to the large window. He can’t see anything outside, only his reflection in the window. He turns off lights, the outdoors now materializing in the relative darkness.

Think I’1l keep you inside tonight. The CAT SHRIEKS. Crispin quickly turns on a light, revealing... A MASKED MAN WITH A GUN. The CAT RUNS, knock the glass of milk and a stack of papers to the floor. The glass SHATTERS, shards of glass and a fallen VOICE RECORD scattering under the refrigerator.
Please! Take whatever you want! The GUNMAN SPEAKS QUIETLY, WITH A CHINESE ACCENT.
I think we will.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 14 He says something in CHINESE and a SECOND MASKED MAN appe behind Crispin, holding a gun to his head.
Establishing the compound.

25 26 A gleaming, high tech command center called CDOC (pronoun see-dock), which stands for Cyber Defense Operations Cent Walls of monitors, work stations, lots of PERSONNEL. Riley stands against the wall drinking a cup of coffee. looks up a set of steel stairs, at the large windows of office overlooking CDOC. Lillian’s office. 27 INT. LILLIAN’S OFFICE - SAME Lillian sits behind her desk arguing with Gabriel.
What did you think was going to happen after India? That’s the third time you went off-book and almost burned Clockwork to a foreign government. And all for intel you already have.
The Indian DIA files make no mention of Amelia’s death.
But they did identify her as one of the attackers.
That doesn’t mean she turned. CIA had her deep black for two years. For all we know, she was still dark.
Maybe, maybe not. But thirty-three bodies incinerated in the fire in Mumbai, and she never reported in or showed up on the grid again.
And that’s evidence? She an 27  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 15

If I go to bed at night and there's no snow on the ground and in the morning I’m shoveling, it snowed. (beat) Gabriel, I’m not going to let you bang and burn your own agency in pursuit of this fairy tale you’re clinging to. Whatever became of Amelia, she’s gone. I’m sorry, but it’s time to move on.
And this secret service agent? That's how we’re moving on?
That’s how I’m protecting my investment.
What is she, then? Body guard, babysitter, chaperone?
All of the above. Her primary job is to keep you alive.
That girl?
That girl's greatest advocate says she personally thwarted the most elaborate assassination attempt on the president since 9/11.
And who's this advocate?
The president. Lillian’s phone buzzes. She picks it up.

Yes, Elizabeth. What do you mean, he’s here now? Is this on the calendar? Well, send him in. (hangs up) Unscheduled visit from the Director of National Intelligence.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 16 The door opens and a SECRETARY lets in DNI OLIVER RUSSELL 50, and DEPUTY DNI TOM LATHAM.
Oliver, Tom. What do we have?
I'm sorry for the surprise, but I didn’t want to use a phone. (noticing Gabriel) Gabriel. Good. Glad you’re here. Everybody sit down. Tom?
Kidnapping. High value, low profile.
You're both here, so what kind of value are we talking about? Red?
I’d say so. And he’s one of yours. Dr. William Crispin. Lillian sits back in her chair. Gabriel exhales.

A SURVEILLANCE VIDEO plays. Image is grainy, obscured, sh through the trees of Crispin’s home. Two masked gunman dr Crispin out of the house to a waiting white van. Lillian addresses the room of a DOZEN of her PEOPLE.

Until he resigned last year, Dr. William Crispin was our top neuroscientist and leading member of the Clockwork team. Everyone takes that in. Gabriel, Riley, and Amos. Also he are CHRIS JAMESON, by-the-book investigator, and his part GONZALO “GONZO” SANCHEZ, scrappy, muscular Latino.
Where’s this video from?
An EPA camera-trap intended to monitor the Chesapeake dwarf bat.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 17
Has it been scrubbed?
As we speak. Masks will make it hard for facial rec. Gabriel?
Nothing.
See? And no audio.
What about the van’s plates?
We're trying to dig out a partial.
Did they get his computer?
FBI swept. No computers found.
His computer isn’t a concern. I created the encryption protocol. Twenty-forty Bit. Impregnable.
Unless they torture him for his password. Everyone turns to Gabriel. He’s right, of course.
Do we know what’s on that computer?
No.
If they get in, they could learn about Gabriel.
He could be a target already.
Then it’s good we have Riley to protect me. Everyone turns to see the woman he’s referring to. Riley.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 18

Everybody, meet Riley O'Neil. Introduce yourselves later. (all business) Listen up. This one isn’t like any kidnapping we’ve handled before. The clock always ticks on the victim. This time it ticks on us, too. With that, everyone is on their feet. Riley, though, foll Lillian out the door.
Riley catches up with Lillian, who doesn’t stop. They continue walking across CDOC and down a long hallway.
Ms. Strand. I hope you find Dr. Crispin, but I put in a call to...
Your ASAC. Yes, I know.

I’m sorry. I’m not a bodyguard. When the President has an event, I’ve already done ninety percent of my work. I can walk through a hotel lobby blindfolded and know how many steps it is to every exit. I have hundreds of support assets, ambulances, a helicopter on the pad, and two F-22s standing by. We don’t make PTZ stops unless it’s absolutely necessary. You want me to ride with a belligerent protectee, with no assets, and everywhere we go is a potential threat zone? I can’t do that.
That’s not your problem. Your problem is that you think protecting the president is more important than this.
Because, respectfully, it is more important than this.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 19

We got very lucky with Gabriel. When we were looking for a candidate, the criteria wasn’t just to find someone capable. We needed to thread a very rare genetic needle. Let me tell you something about him. When he was a Seal he was alternately shot, cut up, tortured, burned and frozen alive. None of it stopped him. He volunteered for five tours in Iraq and Afghanistan. Five. That’s a hero in there.
I’m sure he is. But...

We're in the middle of a technological arms race, unlike anything we’ve seen since the Soviet nukes. Now, if you knew that every nation on earth was trying to steal our nuclear arsenal, would that be important to you?
Yes, obviously, but...
What do you know about Echelon?
It’s a system that develops threat assessments by monitoring electronic communication. Lillian stops and turns to her.

Echelon is a hunter. Echelon can find its prey in a jungle so dense that sunlight can’t breach the canopy. Echelon is the most fearsome weapon in human history. (off her look) Riley, Gabriel is Echelon. And protecting him is the most important thing you'll ever do. Lillian lets that sink in. And it does. Lillian puts an unexpected hand on Riley’s shoulder, then keeps walking, leaving her standing alone.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 20 30 INT. GABRIEL’S CAR - DAY 30 Riley drives. Gabriel watches her, but she doesn’t look b
So, what’s in that sealed file of yours?
I’m surprised you didn’t read it already.
What am I, an animal? (beat) Was it drugs? She looks at him, then back at the road. She’s not playin
Did you hold up a liquor store? (still no answer) Come on, I thought this was the part where we share and bond.
Seems more like the part where I find out how much of a pain in the ass you are.
Wait a sec... Gabriel’s HEAD TILTS sharply -- something is happening.
What’s happening? Are you okay? Should I pull over?
Hold on...
Gabriel?
The kidnappers are Chinese.
Excuse me?
There’s an audio recording of the kidnapping.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 21 31
What do you mean? Why didn’t you mention that at the briefing?

Because I didn’t know it until thirty seconds ago. Riley turns the car up the dirty driveway of Crispin’s ho Gonzo and Jameson wave from a front lawn covered with CRI SCENE TAPE and FORENSIC TEAMS. INT. DR. CRISPIN’S HOUSE - SAME 31 The AUDIO RECORDER sits on the table, playing the recordi of the kidnapping.

Albert, when I was at NASA in ‘69, we sent an astronaut to the moon. A cell phone today has a million times more computer power than we put on that space craft. PULL BACK - Gabriel and Riley, Jameson and Gonzo stand ar the table listening.
Who’s Albert? Gonzo points to the cat’s bowl that says ALBERT on it.
(to Gabriel) How did you know?
Bluetooth. Once I was in range...
Shhh.
Technology isn't revolutionary. It's evolutionary. On the recording we hear ALBERT SHRIEK, GLASS SHATTER...
Please, take whatever you want! WE HEAR the KIDNAPPER SPEAKING IN CHINESE.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 22
There it is. Chinese.
Mandarin, to be exact.
Gabriel, can you translate?
He’s saying, Bring the house.
Bring the house?
Where did you learn to speak Mandarin?
I didn’t. (points to his head) Software.
You should get an upgrade. It’s not bring the house. Gong-Ding means house, yes. But it also means safe or vault.
Bring the safe. Gonzo and Jameson are impressed, which annoys Gabriel.
Gabriel, Riley and Amos sit with NELSON CRISPIN, 35 years old, next to a large window overlooking the Potomac River
What was in the safe? Dad’s computer. We drilled a hole in the back for the wires.
What was on the computer that warranted that?
Nothing compromising. Dad was just paranoid about his memoirs. He’s been dictating them for months. (MORE )
INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 23
He said it’s easier to talk to Albert, so I made him a recorder. Nelson takes a deep breath, tries to collect himself.
He is going to be really happy to see you again, Gabriel. Talks about you all the time. That nearly puts Nelson over the edge. Riley looks at Amo her eyes telling him to say something.
You built the recorder?
Yeah, I wanted it to respond to his voice. Wasn’t hard. I used the Corona chassis, added a few gigs of flash, and hacked some code to make it dump into the computer every night.
That's why it was sending out the signal that Gabriel picked up. It was trying to log in.
Nelson, is there anything in those memoirs that someone could use to build a chip of their own?
No way. We know the rules about black intel.
I have a question. If you don’t mind.
(minding) No, go ahead.
If there’s nothing compromising on that computer, and it’s encrypted, why did it need to be in a safe? Gabriel looks at Riley. Nelson looks caught.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 24

head_text.subj: WE NOW SEE THEM ALL THROUGH THE SCOPE OF A SNIPER

text: An ICE CREAM TRUCK sits alone in the park along the river bank, across from the high rise buildings on the other si Inside the ice cream truck is the sniper, his long rifle sticking out through the window. He’s Chinese.
Back with Gabriel, Riley, Amos and Nelson.
You’re angry at your father.
Why would I be angry?
You’re his lab assistant. He leaves, you’re out, too.
That’s not why he’s angry. He’s angry about me.
What are you talking about?

Just three weeks ago you sent an email to your dad, “Gabriel is all you talk about. He may be your creation, but he’s not your son.” What happened, Nelson? Did you want the chip in your big brain? Is that what it is?
I don’t have the mutation.
And that burns you up, doesn’t it? Tell us about the Chinese.
Chinese? What are you... What’s going on here? Amos?  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 25 35 36
Just tell them the truth, bro.
What was in your father’s safe?

OVERHEAD VIEW of a CIRCULAR MAZE. CONCENTRIC CIRCLES eman from the center. A shiny MONOLITH floats into the frame. monolith is held by tweezers and we suddenly realize the monolith is a MICROCHIP and the maze is the FINGERPRINT o the end of a finger. The CHIP is placed on the FINGER. The finger belongs to JIN CONG, a handsome Chinese man in dark suit. He stares at the chip, holding it up to the li He turns to Dr. Crispin, framed by two ARMED CHINESE MEN.
What would your government do to you if they learned you not only made another chip, but you made it even better than the first?
It probably doesn’t even work.
How long after the surgery will you know if it’s been a success?
Surgery? I’m not implanting an untested chip in a live human! Cong holds up his phone, on it is VIDEO coming from the sniper VIDEOSCOPE pointed at his son’s head.
That is a live image from a Chinese- made M99 sniper rifle.
Gabriel suddenly turns to the window, HE’S PICKING UP THE SIGNAL from the SNIPER RIFLE’S VIDEOSCOPE. He SEES THE IC CREAM TRUCK OUTSIDE with the SNIPER RIFLE POINTED at them
Sniper! Get down! Gabriel runs. Riley is on her feet.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 26
Gabriel, wait!

Gabriel runs out of the building, Riley right behind him, are immediately greeted by a hail of gunfire from the fle TRUCK. Riley dives, knocking Gabriel down. He looks up as disappears around the corner.
What the hell is wrong with you?
I said wait.
If you were a man, I'd... Riley comes right up in his face.
Pretend I am! Gabriel stares her down, then breaks away, walking back inside the building.
INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 a7
Jin Cong walks Crispin into a room. When he turns the lig on WE SEE it is an OPERATING ROOM.
Your surgical team has just landed and will be here shortly. We have spared no expense in outfitting this room with everything you will need.

Everything I’ll need for what? This isn’t some appendectomy. Getting past the histocompatibility complex was a feat in and of itself, but to coax the brain’s chemical neurotransmitters into generating a completely new biochemical language was tantamount to creating a sixth sense.
